mapper.sql: C.content_seq, C.video_id, C.url, C.title, C.description, C.category, C.thumbnail_url, C.duration, C.process_status, C.indate, C.completed_at, C.delete_yn, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(tag SEPARATOR ',') FROM fb_ai_content_tags WHERE content_seq = C.content_seq) AS tags
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fb_ai_contents ( video_id, url, title, description, category, thumbnail_url, duration, process_status, indate ) VALUES ( #{videoId}, #{url}, #{title}, #{description}, #{category}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{duration}, #{processStatus}, #{indate} )
INSERT INTO fb_ai_user_contents ( user_seq, content_seq, progress, indate, last_accessed_at ) VALUES ( get_user_seq_by_uuid(#{uuid}), #{contentSeq}, 0, #{indate}, #{indate} )

INSERT INTO fb_ai_content_tags ( content_seq, tag ) VALUES
(#{contentSeq}, #{tag})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fb_ai_contents C WHERE C.content_seq = #{contentSeq} AND C.delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT , UC.progress as progress, UC.last_accessed_at as last_accessed_at FROM fb_ai_user_contents UC JOIN fb_ai_contents C ON UC.content_seq = C.content_seq WHERE UC.user_content_seq = #{userContentSeq} AND UC.user_seq = get_user_seq_by_uuid(#{uuid}) AND C.delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT
FROM fb_ai_contents WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND delete_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fb_ai_user_contents UC JOIN fb_ai_users U ON UC.user_seq = U.user_seq WHERE UC.content_seq = #{contentSeq} AND U.uuid = #{uuid} AND U.delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT
ORDER BY
C.indate C.title C.indate
ASC DESC
C.indate DESC
FROM fb_ai_contents C JOIN fb_ai_user_contents UC ON C.content_seq = UC.content_seq WHERE C.delete_yn = 'N' AND UC.user_seq = get_user_seq_by_uuid(#{uuid})
AND ( C.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR C.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM fb_ai_content_tags T WHERE T.content_seq = C.content_seq AND T.tag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) )
AND C.category = #{category}
AND C.process_status = #{status}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fb_ai_contents WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND delete_yn = 'N'
